statements: SELECT * FROM DonorBehavior;
SELECT donor_name, total_donations FROM DonorBehavior ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT donor_name, last_donation_date FROM DonorBehavior WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DonorBehavior WHERE last_donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM DonorBehavior ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DonorBehavior WHERE total_donations > 1000 ORDER BY last_donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, total_donations FROM DonorBehavior WHERE last_donation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, total_donations, last_donation_date FROM DonorBehavior WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM DonorBehavior WHERE donor_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005) AND total_donations > 500 ORDER BY donor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DonorBehavior WHERE total_donations < 500 OR last_donation_date < '2020-01-01' GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(donor_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_donations DESC,last_donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, total_donations FROM donors WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, total_donations FROM donors WHERE total_donations BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT donor_name, email, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donation_history ON donors.donor_id = donation_history.donor_id;
SELECT donor_name, total_donations FROM donors;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE total_donations <= 500;
SELECT * FROM donation_history WHERE donation_amount >= 500 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donation_history ON donors.donor_id = donation_history.donor_id WHERE donation_amount < 100 ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, total_donation_amount FROM donors WHERE total_donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT donor_email, email_subject FROM donors JOIN email_logs ON donors.donor_id = email_logs.donor_id WHERE email_sent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, total_donation_amount, email_content FROM donors LEFT JOIN email_logs ON donors.donor_id = email_logs.donor_id;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, total_donation_amount FROM donors WHERE total_donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount >= 500 ORDER BY donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, email_subject, email_sent_date FROM donors LEFT JOIN email_logs ON donors.donor_id = email_logs.donor_id WHERE email_sent_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY email_sent_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, total_donation_amount FROM donors WHERE total_donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY donor_name ASC

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date, email_content FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id LEFT JOIN email_logs ON donors.donor_id = email_logs.donor_id WHERE email_content LIKE '%thank you%' ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, total_donation_amt FROM donors ORDER BY total_donation_amt DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE total_donation_amt > 1000 ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amt > 500 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, total_donation_amt FROM donors WHERE total_donation_amt > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amt, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT donor_name, donation_amt FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amt >= 500;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;

SELECT d.donor_name, do.donation_amount, dc.category_name FROM donors d JOIN donor_donation_mapping ddm ON d.donor_id = ddm.donor_id JOIN donations do ON ddm.donation_id = do.donation_id JOIN donation_categories dc ON do.category_id = dc.category_id;
SELECT * FROM donation_categories WHERE category_id > 2 ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT category_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donation_categories JOIN donations ON donation_categories.category_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT template_text FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY template_id ASC;
